title: R&D Asst. Scientist (BS Degree in Chemistry/Food Science) NEW!
full_description: Job Title: R&D Asst Scientist (BS Degree in Chemistry/Food Science)Location: Legacy Dr. Plano, TX 75024Salary: $25/hr Work Schedule: Monday - Friday 8AM-5AM (40 hrs Flexible - half day Friday) Contract Length: 12 months Description:Will include Sample Preparation support (grinding, weighing), as well as any of the following:Color TestingPhysical Testing - Particle size, viscosity, etc.Moisture Testing - Thermogravimetric, rapid moistureOil Testing - NMR, Soxhlets, wet chemistry, FTIRSalt TestingQuality ControlData Reviewing/Reporting (WinLIMS)Occasional additional tasks/testing as requested by Company employeesRequirements:Candidate must have a minimum of a Bachelor of Science in Chemistry, Food Science, or related field.
